author: greenwichtime
title: Cartels, gangs, rebels join coronavirus fight...
description: In Afghanistan, the Taliban has dispatched health teams to far-flung provinces to confront the coronavirus. In Mexico, drug cartels are offering aid packages to those feeling its economic impact. In Brazil and El Salvador, gangs enforce curfews to prevent its…
content: <ul><li>Flashing highway message boards along Interstate 25 in Albuquerque, New Mexico, urge people in both English and Spanish to stay home amid the coronavirus outbreak on Thursday, April 9, 2020. The new coronavirus causes mild or moderate symptoms for mos… [+8944 chars]
